title: murugan tiruvaDiyE
sahitya:
murugan tiruvaDiyE sharaNam enappaNi manamE


anupallavi

  sharaNamurum aDiyArin sankaTam tirumAru karuNaiyODu urutuNai puriyum pErupakAran


caraNam    sankaTapp-paDuttum cancalam maDuttu pongiDAdu taDuttu pOkkiDavE tuDaittu
tangu taDai illAda dayavuDanE aNaittu tAngum pugazh engum Ongum dInadayALan
